post.body: I'm glad I decided not to give up complaining until next week, 'cause this snow does NOT make me happy.
I'm plumb twitter ecstatic, I guess. I'm 572!
At least you have a chance. I live in Seattle. We lost the Sonics to Oklahoma City (a good thing), then Mariners & Seahawks
Who doesn't love Cats? I've never seen it in the theater, just the DVD, but loved it so much I watched it 5 times in 4 days.
Welcome back, Pam! I think you do really well with your posts and I look forward to reading more.
Will be anxious to read all about sexy Trevlyn!
Better eat your Wheaties!
Cindy, I hope you feel better soon. Don't want to start out the New Year feeling puny!
Leanne, you can come to our house and look at snow!
My favorites are the meetings to plan meetings. Gah.
We watched the whole season of Firefly plus Serenity in one weekend. Loved it, and so did dh.
Sounds like great fun. Send pictures!
I liked Firefly, too. :)
At least you got to go somewhere. We're socked in here in Seattle. We get to go to a show tonight, though. Yay!
ROTFLMAO. Awesome, as usual!
Our son is having a terrible time getting out of the culdesac in this warm, slickery snow. Someone needs to flatten Seattle--or heat it up.
I'm SO mad!!! It snowed 4" while we had dinner. Now our guests are having a heckuva time getting out of the driveway. Bah!
Cleaning house and preparing turkey pot pie for brother and family. Then we'll watch Indie 4 in the home theater. Yay!
It would be pretty difficult to have a worse sports year than our city had. Surely 2009 will be better M's lost 101 games in 2008. ugh
2009 Resolution:I will not eat one bite of mac & cheese. More resolutions to come.
